mean_en: a watch that can be started and stopped very quickly and that is used for measuring the amount of time that is taken to do something (such as to run a race)
sentence: According to my stopwatch, you beat the world record time for this race!
sentence_trans: 根据我的秒表，这次比赛你破了世界纪录！
word_etyma: stop停止 ＋ watch表 → 显示停止时间的表 → stopwatch码表；跑表
